www.goodreads.com-c8ec3ad6-4.text_content: McKillip “I believe in the power of the imagination to remake the world, to release the truth within us, to hold back the night, to transcend death, to charm motorways, to ingratiate ourselves with birds, to enlist the confidences of madmen.” ― J.G.

www.goodreads.com-ec3742a8-5.text_content: Ballard “Imagination is the only weapon in the war against reality.” ― Lewis Carroll “There are painters who transform the sun to a yellow spot, but there are others who with the help of their art and their intelligence, transform a yellow spot into sun” ― Pablo Picasso “Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were, but without it we go nowhere.” ― Carl Sagan “A fit, healthy body—that is the best fashion statement” ― Jess C Scott
